title: left-facing fist: light skin tone

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: This version of the  Left-facing Fist emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported platfo
apple_vendor_description: Apple's left-facing fist emoji, in the light skin tone, is presented with a dynamic, slightly raised posture, embodying strength and solidarity with its smooth, rounded form and subtle highlights.  Its design on Apple devices emphasizes a sense of empowerment and mutual support, with realistic lighting that gives it a tactile feel.  This emoji is commonly used on Apple devices to signify agreement, encouragement, a high-five, or a united front.
